description: Single storey side/rear wraparound extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extension; extending rear first floor window openings; alterations to existing front entrance; installation of PV panels and two rooflights to the front roof slope (Following demolition of existing rear outbuilding/side structure)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 0105-00-EX-001 R3-01 - Existing Site Location Plan, 0105-00-EX-101 R3-01 - Existing Site Plan, 0105-00-EX-201 R3-01 - Existing Plans 01, 0105-00-EX-202 R3-01 - Existing Plans 02, 0105-00-EX-301 R3-01 - Existing Elevations 01, 0105-00-EX-302 R3-01 - Existing Elevations 02, 0105-00-EX-303 R3-01 - Existing Elevations 03, 0105-00-EX-401 R3-01 - Existing Section AA, 0105-00-EX-402 R3-01 - Existing Section BB, 0105-00-GA-101 R3-01 - Proposed Site Plan, 0105-00-GA-201 R3-01 - Proposed Plans 01, 0105-00-GA-202 R3-01 - Proposed Plans 02, 0105-00-GA-301 R3-01 - Proposed Elevations 01, 0105-00-GA-302 R3-01 - Proposed Elevations 02, 0105-00-GA-303 R3-01 - Proposed Elevations 03, Design and Access Statement , Arboricultural Statement prepared by  MMARBORICULTURE LTD, BS5837 Tree Report, Tree Survey and Protection Plan prepared by Ambient Studio dated 08.06.2022.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
